full_summary:
# Modernization of Service Barriers - Archambault Institution
### RFP: Procurement of Building Maintenance and Repair Services

**RFP Reference Number:** WS4564640232
**Publication Date:** May 24, 2024
**Closing Date:** July 3, 2024 (14:00 HNE)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites vendors to submit proposals for the modernization of service barriers at the Archambault Institution in Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, Québec, Canada. This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the procurement of building maintenance and repair services, as outlined in Annex A.

**Key Information:**

* Bids must be submitted electronically prior to 14:00 HNE on the closing date.
* Late bids will be considered non-responsive.
* Vendors are required to provide all supporting documentation and bid submission in accordance with the RFP.
* Only bids meeting the specified requirements will be considered.

**Trade Agreements:**

* This procurement is subject to:
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**End-User Entities:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Québec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Anton Moses (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [anton.moses@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:anton.moses@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:**

* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19810569?extsite=MTk4MTA1NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
